attachments.fallback: Save 50% on Heart of Crown PC on Steam
attachments.title: Save 50% on Heart of Crown PC on Steam
attachments.text: Which princess will you promote in this battle of succession? Heart of Crown is a deck-building card game with online play, scenario campaigns, and free play which offer a wide variety of challenges and enjoyment to be had.
